Penthouse Rooms

The big cannoli. These rooms have a bed, a floor (!!!), windows, a bathroom WITH SOAP, that's right, WITH SOAP. What more is there? I mean, just period? Just in general, what else do you even need? Roof, check. Walls, check. Bed, check PLUS PLUS.
